name: dispatch-hub-backend
description: Backend API for Dispatch Hub with PostgreSQL and WebSocket

scripts.db:migrate:manual: psql -d dispatch_hub -f migrations/001_initial.sql && psql -d dispatch_hub -f migrations/002_enhance_validated_barcodes.sql && psql -d dispatch_hub -f migrations/003_enhance_gatepass_invoices.sql
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:test
scripts.db:reset:recreate: psql -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS dispatch_hub;' && psql -c 'CREATE DATABASE dispatch_hub;' && npm run db:migrate
